name: Super Trump Collection 2
overview: Super Trump Collection 2 is a card game compilation and the sequel to 1995's Super Trump Collection. A few of the card games support two players, though most involve AI players. The sequel increases the number of card games from seven to ten. These games include, in counter-clockwise order on the main menu: Video Poker, Video Blackjack, Old Maid, Speed, Sevens, Memory Match, Rummy, Crazy Eights, President and Mau-Mau. Each card game also has a distinct visual theme. For instance, Rummy uses neon signs like Las Vegas, while Sevens has an aquatic theme.
